question: How do I create an metamask account?
answer: after installing the MetaMask wallet, click on the MetsMask icon in the toolbar of your browser. Then click on Get Started. Click Create a Wallet to create an Atrium wallet. At this stage, you announce your agreement or disagreement with whether or not Metamask Wallet collects your user data.

question: How to withdraw money from metamask?
answer: To withdraw money from MetaMask to your bank account, you need to send your Ethereum to a cryptocurrency exchange like Binance. Next, sell your Ethereum on Binance and withdraw it to your bank account. You wonâ€™t be able to sell your Ethereum on MetaMask. Hence, you need to send your Ethereum to a cryptocurrency exchange like Binance.

question: How do I transfer my metamask wallet to another account?
answer: Simply copy your new MetaMask public address and go to your existing wallet or exchange to send funds to your new wallet address. You can find your MetaMask address under account name (in the format 0x12r45...6HJ9).

question: How does metamask keep my data private?
answer: MetaMask keeps your wallet data private unless you authorize permission to share your account address. You will see a MetaMask confirmation when websites request access to view your account address. Transactions made using MetaMask are registered on Ethereum blockchain and are publicly available.

question: What is metamask (MTM)?
answer: Available as a browser extension and as a mobile app, MetaMask equips you with a key vault, secure login, token wallet, and token exchangeâ€”everything you need to manage your digital assets. MetaMask provides the simplest yet most secure way to connect to blockchain-based applications.

question: What is a transaction in metamask?
answer: Sending Transactions Transactions are a formal action on a blockchain. They are always initiated in MetaMask with a call to the eth_sendTransaction method. They can involve a simple sending of ether, may result in sending tokens, creating a new smart contract, or changing state on the blockchain in any number of ways.

question: How to Speed Up or Cancel Transactions on MetaMask
answer: Click the speed up button and pay extra to make sure your transaction goes through ASAP OR click the cancel button and pay a little extra to cancel your transaction
